TopicTitle: Pinned orbital markers invisible after switching from map view to flight view and back

Articles.Content:
• in flight
  • go to map view
  • pin an orbital marker (e.g. AP or PE) -> marker info is pinned
  • switch to flight view
  • switch back to map view
    -> orbital marker info is invisible and only reappears after mouseover on orbital marker
